Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
A class that represents a flight booking system. The flight booking system stores information about customers, flights, and bookings. It provides methods for adding and removing flights and customers, and for retrieving information about these entities.

  • Method Details

    • getSystemDate

      public LocalDate getSystemDate()
      Gets the current date of the flight booking system.
      Returns:
      the current date of the flight booking system

    • getFlights

      public List<Flight> getFlights()
      Gets a list of all flights in the flight booking system. The list is generated by retrieving the values of the `flights` map and wrapping them in an unmodifiable list.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of all flights in the system

    • getCustomers

      public List<Customer> getCustomers()
      Gets a list of all customers in the flight booking system. The list is generated by retrieving the values of the `customers` map and wrapping them in an unmodifiable list.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of all customers in the system

    • getFlightByID

      public Flight getFlightByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Gets a flight by its ID. The flight is retrieved from the `flights` map using the specified ID as the key. If no flight is found with the specified ID, a `FlightBookingSystemException` is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to retrieve
      Returns:
      the flight with the specified ID
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if there is no flight with the specified ID

    • getCustomerByID

      public Customer getCustomerByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Gets a customer by their ID. The customer is retrieved from the `customers` map using the specified ID as the key. If no customer is found with the specified ID, a `FlightBookingSystemException` is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the customer to retrieve
      Returns:
      the customer with the specified ID
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if there is no customer with the specified ID

    • getCustomerByBookingId

      public int getCustomerByBookingId(int bookingId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Gets the ID of a customer by their booking ID. The method iterates through a list of all customers in the system, and searches each customer's bookings for a booking with the specified ID. If a matching booking is found, the ID of the associated customer is returned. If no matching booking is found, a `FlightBookingSystemException` is thrown.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to search for
      Returns:
      the ID of the customer associated with the specified booking
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if there is no booking with the specified ID

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a flight to the system. The flight is added to the `flights` map, using the flight's ID as the key. If the flight has a duplicate ID, an `IllegalArgumentException` is thrown. If there is already a flight with the same number and departure date in the system, a `FlightBookingSystemException` is thrown.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the flight has a duplicate ID
      FlightBookingSystemException - if there is already a flight with the same number and departure date in the system

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws IllegalArgumentException, FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a customer to the system. The customer is added to the `customers` map, using the customer's ID as the key. If the customer has a duplicate ID, an `IllegalArgumentException` is thrown. If there is already a customer with the same email or phone number in the system, a `FlightBookingSystemException` is thrown.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the customer has a duplicate ID
      FlightBookingSystemException - if there is already a customer with the same email or phone number in the system
